tool_description: This API provides Keyword Rankings for a specific keyword and  app reviews for an app.
name: iOS App Store API
title: iOS App Store API

api_list.name: Get Reviews
api_list.description:
Use this API to get reviews for any app on the app store. All you need is the app id, which can be found in the url of the app.  

Example: For example: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/kingpin-sports-betting-tips/id1390339038

The ID for this app would be 317469184

api_list.name: Get Keyword Rankings
api_list.description: Simply put in a keyword and a country code, and get a list of apps and how the rank for that given keyword, in the respective country. Country must be in capital letters, and must be the two letter abbreviation.
